q: Klunk and Catherine Bodock, media director of Keenan-Nagle Advertising in Allentown, agree that Michael Vick still has a few more dues to pay before deals are struck with big-money companies on the national stage. I'm glad the Eagles hired him, Bodock said. ''He deserved a second chance, he did his time. That said, from a marketing perspective, I'm not sure that his image has been repaired enough. The value of the 120,000 pieces in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo is inestimable, not only in scientific or financial terms, but because they represent the Egyptian people's cultural identity. But the country's newly appointed minister of antiquities, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against ''rumours.''
